response.overview: Have you ever wanted someone so much that you want to bite them, cut them into pieces, cook them and eat them? The kitchen is clean, Zoe is preparing a special meal. She pours some wine and take a sip, making it very clear that Parker is not welcome to drink from her glass. His arms are tied to the chair. He also canÂ´t move, or speak. You can see in his eyes that the poor guy is starving! - but what is he really wishing, the meal, or her?
response.title: Carne
